titles.title: Aviation Security Checkpoint Technology Fund Act of 2022
Aviation Security Checkpoint Technology Fund Act of 2022

To amend title 49, United States Code, to establish an Aviation Security Checkpoint Technology Fund in the Department of Homeland Security to fund investments in aviation security checkpoint technology, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Homeland Security.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Transportation and Maritime Security.

bill.summary:
Aviation Security Checkpoint Technology Fund Act of 2022
This bill establishes the Aviation Security Checkpoint Technology Fund within the Department of Homeland Security to fund the procurement, deployment, and sustainment of aviation security checkpoint technology.
